SELECT o.order_id, o.u_id, m.username, o.order_status, o.total_price, o.pickup_method, o.order_time, o.store_name, o.total_quantity, o.daily_order_num, o.request_text,
od.order_detail_id, od.menu_id, m_menu.menu_name, od.amount AS item_amount, od.temp, od.tumbler, od.shot, od.vanilla_syrup, od.whipped_cream FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN menu m_menu ON od.menu_id = m_menu.menu_id LEFT JOIN member m ON o.u_id = m.id WHERE o.store_name = #{storeName} AND o.order_status = '주문접수' ORDER BY o.daily_order_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( u_id, order_status, total_price, pickup_method, order_time, total_quantity, store_name, daily_order_num, request_text ) VALUES ( #{uId}, #{orderStatus}, #{totalPrice}, #{orderType}, #{orderTime}, #{totalQuantity}, #{storeName}, ( SELECT COALESCE(MAX(o2.daily_order_num), 0) + 1 FROM orders o2 WHERE DATE(o2.order_time) = CURDATE() AND o2.store_name = #{storeName} ), #{requestText} )
